name: Pong (itch) (metulburr)
description:
Pong game written using Python/Pygame. Contains exe for Windows users without pygame/python installed and code for users that want to look at it.

1 Player. 2 Modes (regular pong and ghost pong)

Code hosted at:

https://github.com/metulburr/pong

http://pygame.org/project-Metulburr%27s+Pong-2875-4679.html
